>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.hIhgdXnqGHBm0A64]{Envoy Improvisation}

@Icon[type:language-dependent] @Icon[type:mind-affecting] @Icon[type:sense-dependent]

You can use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.4i1U9YQgb2tgN748]{Inspiring Boost} as a full action. If you do, all allies within 60 feet of you regain a number of Stamina Points equal to twice your envoy level + your Charisma modifier (up to their maximum) [[2*@classes.envoy.levels+@abilities.cha.mod]]; at 15th level, this increases to three times your envoy level + your Charisma modifier [[3*@classes.envoy.levels+@abilities.cha.mod]]. Once an ally has benefited from your inspiring boost or inspiring oration, that ally canâ€™t gain the benefits of either improvisation again until they recover Stamina Points following a 10-minute rest.

As with the inspiring boost envoy improvisation, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to add your envoy level to the number of Stamina Points regained. You must have the inspiring boost improvisation to select this improvisation.
